divs: sighting detailsi saw a straight line of 3 lights, i thought it was orions belt and then i realized they were too far apart and they were to the east looked like it was close to butler, mo. the lights didnt so much blink but more of a shimmer like a white\red shimmer. theres absolutely no way they were planes or helicopters because i would have heard them and they were too still. however it did look like there were two planes that were heading to the lights. i saw two white blinking lights go towards two of the stationary lights.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Butler
There was one other sighting in Butler on or around March 26th 2012
Summary: I saw a straight line of 3 lights going from NE to SW
